sentences.en: Athletics'anti - dope campaigners are faced with a credibility problem.
sentences.cn: 田径运动的 反 兴奋剂倡道者面临信誉问题.

sentences.en: Credibility attacks usually fall into several broad categories.
sentences.cn: 可信性抨击一般可分为若干大的范畴.

sentences.en: He has been using every opportunity to boost his credibility as a budget cutter.
sentences.cn: 他一有机会就吹嘘自己削减预算的能力。

sentences.en: Incidents like these began to undermine Angleton's credibility.
sentences.cn: 这一类事情开始损毁安格尔顿的声誉.

sentences.en: It's a team unrivalled in stature, expertise and credibility.
sentences.cn: 这个团队的名声、专业技能和信誉都是无可匹敌的。

sentences.en: Ominous items of news of varied credibility now began to come in.
sentences.cn: 这时,可信程度不同的各种不祥的消息开始传来了.

sentences.en: One voter in Brasilia summed up the mood — "Politicians have lost credibility," he complained.
sentences.cn: 一位巴西利亚的选民将人们的心情一言概之——“政客们已无信誉可言”，他抱怨道。

sentences.en: Recommendations from two previous clients helped to establish her credibility.
sentences.cn: 两位以前的客户的推荐有助于确立她的诚信度.

sentences.en: The credibility stretched the idea to the limits.
sentences.cn: 这种理论的可靠性降到了最低限度.

sentences.en: The implication that marital infidelity enhances a leader's credibility is preposterous.
sentences.cn: 婚姻不忠会提升领导人可信度的暗示荒谬之极。

sentences.en: The police have lost their credibility.
sentences.cn: 警方已经失去了公众的信任。

sentences.en: The president will have to work hard to restore his credibility.
sentences.cn: 总统将不得不努力使公众恢复对他的信任。

sentences.en: The reason that he comes is not very credibility.
The scandal brought his credibility to its lowest ebb.
sentences.cn: 那件丑闻使他的信誉跌到最低点.

sentences.en: There is a credibility gap developing between employers and employees.
sentences.cn: 雇主和雇员之间出现了信任危机。

words.tran_cn: 可信的；声誉好的；值得称赞的
信任；凭证；祭器台（等于credence table，credenza）

trans.tran_en: the quality of deserving to be believed and trusted
